topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack(R) Carrier Grade (Beta): Deleting Images

body.p: You can delete images, as needed. A deleted image is no longer available. Any instances launched from the deleted instance are not affected.

li.p: Launch the HP Helion OpenStack(R) Horizon Dashboard.
Click the Project dashboard, then the System panel, then the Images link.
In the Images screen, click Project to display all images associated with your project.
In the Images screen, for the image you want to delete, click the arrow icon in the Actions menu and select Delete.
To delete multiple images, click the check box next to name of each image to delete. Click Delete Images.
The image is no longer available. Any instances launched from the deleted instance are not affected.
